title: Competency-Based Congenital Cardiology Leadership Education: Integrated Echocardiography and Clinical Judgment Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Knowledge of Cardiology, Experience in Medical Administration, Foundational Skills in Ultrasound Interpretation
context.additional_context: Advanced training for managers in medical device companies, focusing on simulation and case analysis to enhance practical decision-making capabilities.

learning_goals: Possess integrated diagnostic capability linking clinical symptoms and imaging findings in congenital heart disease patients
Design and implement a team-based decision-making process based on complex patient cases
Develop competency assessment tools based on the Entrustable Professional Activities (EPAs) framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
